questions.question: 1. RNA secondary structure is formed by

answers.a: The linear sequence of nucleotides in RNA
answers.c: The folding pattern formed by base-pairing interactions within RNA
answers.d: The process of RNA being transcribed from DNA

questions.question: 2. The difference between RNA from DNA in terms of structure is

answers.a: RNA is double-stranded, while DNA is single-stranded
answers.b: RNA contains thymine instead of uracil
answers.c: RNA does not play a role in protein synthesis
answers.d: RNA has a ribose sugar instead of deoxyribose

questions.question: 3. The base pairs are considered Watson-Crick pairs in RNA is:
4. RNA secondary structure prediction important because

answers.a: It helps in understanding RNA function and interactions
answers.b: It is essential for designing RNA-based drugs and therapies
answers.c: It aids in studying RNA-protein interactions

questions.question: The factors contributes to RNA tertiary structure stability is:

answers.b: Hydrogen bonding and metal ion coordination
